com.hazelcast.internal.serialization.impl

Class ObjectDataOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • com.hazelcast.internal.serialization.impl.ObjectDataOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectDataOutput, VersionAware, Closeable, DataOutput, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    public class ObjectDataOutputStream
extends OutputStream
implements ObjectDataOutput, Closeable

      • setVersion

        public void setVersion(Version version)
        If the serializer supports versioning it may set the version to use for the serialization on this object.
        Parameters:
        version - version to set

      • getVersion

        public Version getVersion()
        If the serializer supports versioning it may set the version to use for the serialization on this object. This method makes the version available for the user.
        Specified by:
        getVersion in interface VersionAware
        Returns:
        the version of Version.UNKNOWN if the version is unknown to the object.
